channel.title: How do I fix "wielding" ALL new models added

item.title: How do I fix "wielding" ALL new models added
item.dc:creator: @owned654321241 owned654321241
item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

Just like 9n said whenever you add new models they automatically go to the right hand slot no matter what.
You need to open item.java find the correct slot that the item goes into and put the item id in that section.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix "wielding" ALL new models added

open ur server files and go to item.java and there u should get it from there.

item.title: How do I fix "wielding" ALL new models added
item.dc:creator: @low93bowtie low93bowtie
item.description:
@low93bowtie wrote:

I have added a few new models to my server and i cannot figure out what i am doing wrong. Every time i wear an item, it wields it in right hand instead of wearing it or whatever it is supposed to do. What am i doing wrong.

here is what i did:
I added model from another 317 source (working model in that source)
ran “add models”
added item to class8.java like this:

if (i == 7810) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 7810; class8.anInt181 = 595; class8.anInt190 = 0; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt199 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 7810; class8.anInt200 = 7810; class8.anInt175 = 56; class8.anInt197 = 116; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Bandos Boots"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Some sturdy boots.".getBytes(); }
compiled
and then added to item.cfg.

Did I miss a step or do it wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix "wielding" ALL new models added
